item.title: By: Jim Ramsden
item.dc:creator: Jim Ramsden
item.description: @owen My thoughts exactly. Looks great though, and still a great source of inspiration, regardless of the silly way it's been built.
item.content:encoded: @owen My thoughts exactly. Looks great though, and still a great source of inspiration, regardless of the silly way it’s been built.

item.title: By: Owen
item.dc:creator: Owen
item.description: Don't really see why they needed to build this all in Flash... could have just as easily been built on Wordpress - and a lot more accessible at that.
item.content:encoded: Don’t really see why they needed to build this all in Flash… could have just as easily been built on WordPress – and a lot more accessible at that.
